item.title: Noon 11.11 Sale Extended! Grab These Top 10 Budget Phones with an Extra 15% Off
item.description: Your Ultimate Guide to Smartphone Savings The biggest sale of the year isn’t over yet! Noon.com has extended its spectacular 11.11 sale, giving you more time to snag incredible deals. If you’ve been waiting to upgrade your smartphone without breaking the bank, this is your golden opportunity. We’ve scoured the sale to bring you the best budget-friendly phones that offer premium features without the premium price tag. From the trendy Nothing CMF Phone 1 to the reliable Vivo V50 Lite, there’s something for everyone.
